ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Can Anyone Help?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Find the person that you got the game from and get your money back.  They ve scammed you. The CD Key is tied to the account that was created by the person
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Scott" <good_one_shaggie@...>
>

> Hi all....
>
> Hope you're all very well!
>
> I just brought a second-hand EverQuest game....couldn't wait to get
> home and join the fun...
>
> Then it happened the Cd key number doesn't work! (aaaaa!)
>
> Does anybody know what I can do to make it work or does anybody know
> of any numbers that do work?

Find the person that you got the game from and get your money back. They've
scammed you.

The CD Key is tied to the account that was created by the person that used
the game before you. Once it's been used, it can't be used again.
